DOC.brief_summary: Use of Clearpath to facilitate successful completion of colonoscopy procedures with sub-optimal preparation.
DOC.criteria: 1. Patient 1870 years 2. Scheduled for colonoscopy 3. Providing informed consent 1. Known large polyps (> 2 cm) for polypectomy 2. Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) 3. Previous colonic surgery 4. Known or suspected stricture 5. Significant co morbidity 6. Significant diverticular disease 7. Contraindicated to receive oral Sodium Picosulfate solution
